name: NiMC-10
description:
I saw some YouTube videos of an old game, Dr. Nim, that plays the bar game of Nim. I made a version for the MC-10. If the emulator can be believed, it will fit into an original 4K MC-10. It will also work on a Color Computer 1 and 2 with slight modifications. I have enclosed the NIM.C10 file for the MC-10 and a NIM.DSK file for the Color Computer 1 & 2.

Update 2018-09-29

Made a new version where you can select a skill level to have a fighting chance.

For the MC-10:
NIM2.C10

On disk for Coco:
NIM2.BAS
